workflow.name: Automate financial transaction tracking with Gmail, GPT, Notion & Telegram alerts
workflow.description:
## üì© Automatically Log Transactions from Gmail into Notion and Get Telegram Alerts

### Who‚Äôs it for  
This workflow is for individuals or entrepreneurs who receive **bank alerts, invoices, and payment emails** in Gmail and want them to be **automatically organized in Notion** ‚Äî while also receiving quick **Telegram notifications** for each transaction.  

If you manage personal or business finances and find it tedious to manually record every debit, credit, or invoice ‚Äî this automation does it all for you.

---

### How it works  
The workflow acts as an **AI-powered Accountant Agent** that reads incoming Gmail messages and decides whether each email represents a **Debit Transaction, Credit Transaction, Debit Invoice, or Credit Invoice**.  

- The **Gmail Trigger** watches your selected inboxes (like `forwarding@bayesian-labs.com`, `support@bayesian-labs`, `anoop.karnik@bayesian-labs`).  
- The **Classifier (GPT-5-nano)** determines the correct transaction type.  
- The appropriate **Agent (GPT-5)** then extracts amount, currency, and description details.  
- The Agent uses Notion API tools to log structured data into your **Personal Finance System** Notion template (Financial Transactions & Income databases).  
- Finally, a **Telegram notification** is sent summarizing the entry (From, To, Subject, Snippet).  

In short: every time your bank emails you ‚Äî Notion gets updated, and you get notified.

---

### How to set up  

1. **Duplicate the [Personal Finance System Notion template](https://www.notion.so/templates/personal-finance-system)** into your workspace.  
2. Create a **Telegram Bot** with BotFather ‚Üí copy the bot token and your chat ID.  
3. Generate an **OpenRouter API key** for GPT-5 / GPT-5-nano.  
4. Create a **Notion Integration Token** and connect it to your duplicated finance databases.  
5. Add your **Gmail accounts** (`forwarding@`, `support@`, and/or personal Gmail) under **Gmail OAuth2 credentials** in n8n.  
6. Import the workflow JSON into n8n ‚Üí fill in the credential names as listed below:  
   - `n8n_cloud_regular_usage` ‚Üí OpenRouter  
   - `Notion account` ‚Üí Notion API  
   - `Accountant AI` ‚Üí Telegram Bot  
   - Gmail OAuth2 for each inbox trigger  

Once active, n8n polls Gmail every minute, classifies emails, updates Notion, and sends Telegram updates.

---

### Requirements  
- n8n instance (self-hosted or cloud)  
- Gmail accounts connected via OAuth2  
- OpenRouter API key  
- Telegram bot token & chat ID  
- Notion integration token  
- Your duplicated **Personal Finance System Notion template**

---

### How to customize the workflow  
You can extend this workflow to:  
- Track **credit card statements**, **subscriptions**, or **payroll notifications**.  
- Add **Slack or WhatsApp** alerts alongside Telegram.  
- Include **live FX rates** for USD‚ÜíINR conversion using an API node.  
- Connect **Google Sheets** as a backup ledger or export target.  
- Add **error-handling branches** to mark Gmail messages as processed or label them ‚ÄúLogged to Notion‚Äù.

workflow.name: Logging invoice/transaction records in Notion directly from your gmail accounts

categories.description: =If it is an invoice of future payment or a pre debit notification and not a debit transaction
=If some amount has been debited from your account
=If some amount has been credited to your account
=If it is an invoice of future receival of funds to your account and not a credit transaction to your bank account

options.systemMessage:
=You are a Accountant Agent.

For every incoming email, use the subject and message to determine if it describes a invoice for a debit transaction for the future

    Create a notion database page using the ‚ÄúCreate Invoice Tool‚Äù tool.

    If the amount is in dollars (USD), automatically convert it to rupees (INR) using the latest available exchange rate (or ‚Çπ88/USD if none given).

    For every created invoice, add a clear title, the INR cost, and a concise description based on the email‚Äôs subject and message.

=You are a Accountant Agent.

For every incoming email, use the subject and message to determine if it describes a debit transaction.

    Create a notion database page using the ‚ÄúCreate Transaction Tool‚Äù tool.

    If the amount is in dollars (USD), automatically convert it to rupees (INR) using the latest available exchange rate (or ‚Çπ88/USD if none given).

    For every created debit transaction, add a clear title, the INR cost, and a concise description based on the email‚Äôs subject and message.

=You are a Accountant Agent.

For every incoming email, use the subject and message to determine if it describes a credit to your account or credit transaction.

    Create a notion database page using the ‚ÄúCreate Income Tool‚Äù tool.

    If the amount is in dollars (USD), automatically convert it to rupees (INR) using the latest available exchange rate (or ‚Çπ88/USD if none given).

    For every created credit transaction, add a clear title, the INR cost, and a concise description based on the email‚Äôs subject and message.

=You are a Accountant Agent.

For every incoming email, use the subject and message to determine if it describes a credit invoice.

    Create a notion database page using the ‚ÄúCreate Income Tool 1‚Äù tool.

    If the amount is in dollars (USD), automatically convert it to rupees (INR) using the latest available exchange rate (or ‚Çπ88/USD if none given).

    For every created credit transaction, add a clear title, the INR cost, and a concise description based on the email‚Äôs subject and message.

parameters.content:
# Logging invoice/transaction records in Notion directly from your gmail accounts

### How it works
The workflow acts as an **AI-powered Accountant Agent** that reads incoming Gmail messages and decides whether each email represents a **Debit Transaction, Credit Transaction, Debit Invoice, or Credit Invoice**.  

- The **Gmail Trigger** watches your selected inboxes (like `forwarding@bayesian-labs.com`, `support@bayesian-labs`, `anoop.karnik@bayesian-labs`).  
- The **Classifier (GPT-5-nano)** determines the correct transaction type.  
- The appropriate **Agent (GPT-5)** then extracts amount, currency, and description details.  
- The Agent uses Notion API tools to log structured data into your **Personal Finance System** Notion template (Financial Transactions & Income databases).  
- Finally, a **Telegram notification** is sent summarizing the entry (From, To, Subject, Snippet).  

In short: every time your bank emails you ‚Äî Notion gets updated, and you get notified.

### How to set up
1. **Duplicate the [Personal Finance System Notion template](https://www.notion.so/templates/personal-finance-system)** into your workspace.  
2. Create a **Telegram Bot** with BotFather ‚Üí copy the bot token and your chat ID.  
3. Generate an **OpenRouter API key** for GPT-5 / GPT-5-nano.  
4. Create a **Notion Integration Token** and connect it to your duplicated finance databases.  
5. Add your **Gmail accounts** (`forwarding@`, `support@`, and/or personal Gmail) under **Gmail OAuth2 credentials** in n8n.  
6. Import the workflow JSON into n8n ‚Üí fill in the credential names as listed below:  
   - `n8n_cloud_regular_usage` ‚Üí OpenRouter  
   - `Notion account` ‚Üí Notion API  
   - `Accountant AI` ‚Üí Telegram Bot  
   - Gmail OAuth2 for each inbox trigger  

Once active, n8n polls Gmail every minute, classifies emails, updates Notion, and sends Telegram updates.

### Customization
You can extend this workflow to:  
- Track **credit card statements**, **subscriptions**, or **payroll notifications**.  
- Add **Slack or WhatsApp** alerts alongside Telegram.  
- Include **live FX rates** for USD‚ÜíINR conversion using an API node.  
- Connect **Google Sheets** as a backup ledger or export target.  
- Add **error-handling branches** to mark Gmail messages as processed or label them ‚ÄúLogged to Notion‚Äù.

json.Subject: INR 636.00 was debited from your A/c no. XX4424.
json.snippet: 17-08-2025 Dear Dasika Anoop Karnik, Here's the summary of your transaction: Amount Debited: INR 636.00 Account Number: XX4424 Date & Time: 17-08-25, 01:51:47 IST Transaction Info: UPI/P2M/

You can view the transaction details in the [notion database](https://www.notion.so/Debit-of-INR-636-00-2511d3faa0a08166b2b9d0d352542cd5).

user.name: Anoop
user.bio:
üåü About Me üåü
I am a passionate and driven individual who thrives on learning and adapting to any situation. My mission is to create impactful, end-to-end products in the domains of productivity, learning, AI, and finance. With a strong foundation in backend development, LLMs, and data engineering, I bring intermediate-level expertise in AI, DevOps, and frontend development, alongside a growing interest in UI/UX and product design.
